deleteCategory.title: Delete Category
deleteCategory.desc: Are you sure you want to delete the category {{name}}? This will permanently delete all associated images and require re-training the model.

renameCategory.title: Rename Category
renameCategory.desc: Enter a new name for {{name}}. You will be required to retrain the model for the name change to take affect.

description.invalidName: "invalidName": "Invalid name. Names can only include letters, numbers, spaces, apostrophes, underscores, and hyphens."
